text: mathalu l-janati allati wuʿida l-mutaquna fiha anharun min main ghayri asinin wa-anharun min labanin lam yataghayyar taʿmuhu wa-anharun min khamrin ladhatin lilsharibina wa-anharun min ʿasalin musaffan walahum fiha min kulli l-thamarati wamaghfiratun min rabbihim kaman huwa khalidun fi l-nari wasuqu maan hamiman faqattaʿa amʿaahum
